Plot: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid-1940s.
Title: The Aviator
Actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Cate Blanchett, Kate Beckinsale, John C. Reilly
tomatoConsensus: With a rich sense of period detail, The Aviator succeeds thanks to typically assured direction from Martin Scorsese and a strong performance from Leonardo DiCaprio, who charts Howard Hughes' descent from eccentric billionaire to reclusive madman.
